name: LMS
stacks: Codeignitor / PHP / MySQL / jQuery / JSON / Html /  CSS / Bootstrap
software_desc_1: It's a customized Learning Management System with a lot of features like secure video streaming, social media logins, customized student enrollments for regular & In-house students, Call / SMS / Whatsapp / Email integrations, E-commerce features & much more.

learn.content: Integrated Social media API for login & registration (Google/LinkedIn/Facebook).
Integrated VdoCipher API for secure video streaming.
Integrated Twilio / Sendblue / Wati for SMS & calls.
Developed crud modules according to the client need.
Integrated E-commerce features from scratch like Buy Now, Payment Gateway, Notifications, Webhooks, etc.
Developed a detailed watch history of a student as per client need.
Maintaining this application from 2020 to till Now.

It is the Large scale application of my career in which I have worked.
